data.name: Carnage Cross
data.detailed_description:
Carnage Cross is a vehicular death match game with six playable drivers, levels, and an arsenal of weapons, specials, opponents and roguelike abilities at your disposal. Play the first episode, "Leo's Report", or pick and choose the driver and maps you want to play.

Playable Carnage Cross: Episode 1, "Leo's Report" - a singleplayer story mode about one driver and his crusade for righteous fury, includes battle mode with six drivers and specials, six maps, and over 15 different pick-ups and rogue-like abilities.
data.about_the_game:
Carnage Cross is a vehicular death match game with six playable drivers, levels, and an arsenal of weapons, specials, opponents and roguelike abilities at your disposal. Play the first episode, "Leo's Report", or pick and choose the driver and maps you want to play.

Playable Carnage Cross: Episode 1, "Leo's Report" - a singleplayer story mode about one driver and his crusade for righteous fury, includes battle mode with six drivers and specials, six maps, and over 15 different pick-ups and rogue-like abilities.
data.short_description: Start your engines in the vehicular combat game Carnage Cross, with six playable drivers, levels, and an arsenal of weapons, specials and rogue-like abilities at your disposal in story or skirmish modes, your hi-octane skills will uncover secrets of the mysterious and destructive contest.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
